## CredentialIssuanceRequestMessage type

CredentialIssuanceRequestMessage represent Iden3message for credential request

**Signature:**

    id: string;
    typ?: MediaType;
    type: ProtocolMessage;
    thid?: string;
    body?: CredentialIssuanceRequestMessage;
